title: Apple might unveil a smaller, M2-powered MacBook Pro next month
content:
The next hardware-focused Apple event could be only a few weeks away. We are expecting the company to debut new products on March 8. These devices could include the iPhone SE 3rd Gen and a new iPad Air. While it’s still unclear what the company will exactly reveal during the virtual event, a new leak

The post Apple might unveil a smaller, M2-powered MacBook Pro next month appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The latest leaks suggest that Apple might unveil a smaller MacBook Pro model that is powered by an all-new M2 chip next month.
